Student Employment     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Employment      Student Employment   Main Menu    About SEO    Students           Job Listings    On Campus Job Requirements    Job Location & Development    Student FAQs         Departments           Hiring Procedures    Job Descriptions    Handbook    Forms    Student Wage Plan    FAQs         Off Campus Employers    Events           Webinars    Workshops    On Campus Job Fair    UIC Spring Internship & Part-Time Job Fair    National Student Employment Week (NSEW)         Contact     Eyebrow menu    Career Services    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Job Listings      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Student Employment    Students    Job Listings        Students  UIC students can view openings for on and off-campus positions at UICcareers.com . Work-study jobs are open to students who have applied for financial aid and have received a work-study award.       UIC Careers       Who can post?   UICCareers.com is for on and off-campus employers, both for departments as well as for companies.  Disclaimer: The Student Employment Office provides a referral service and makes no particular recommendations regarding employers, nor do we make any representations or guarantees about positions posted. Therefore, we urge you to perform due diligence when applying for or accepting off-campus employment, as you are doing so at your own risk. Please notify us immediately if you have concerns about one of our job postings.
